title: Sr. Graphic Designer - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Sr. Graphic Designer   Implement sophisticated user interfaces using industry standard technologies and techniques. Support web servers and other servers via scheduled maintenance, performance tuning, and monitoring.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
